title: Define Quantum Entanglement Principles
description: Conduct comprehensive research on the fundamental principles of quantum entanglement, providing clear explanations and examples, with a focus on their implications for the QuantumEntanglementCommunicator project. This documentation will also include potential use cases and theoretical applications.

title: Design Quantum Communication Protocol
description: Develop a protocol for utilizing quantum entanglement for communication.

title: Prototype Quantum Communication Device
description: Develop a functional prototype of the quantum communication device. This includes researching and implementing quantum entanglement principles for communication.

title: Develop Interplanetary QE Communication Software
description: Write the software for interplanetary quantum entanglement communication.

title: Implement Security Measures for QE Communicator
description: Ensure secure communication by implementing appropriate security measures.

title: Create User Manual for Quantum Entanglement Communicator
description: Write a user manual explaining the operation and usage of the quantum entanglement communicator.
